Moving In The City: Three Centuries of Transportation in New York Portfolio
Moving In The City: Three Centuries of Transportation in New York Portfolio

Consists of four portfolios of posters, postcards, greeting cards, and other reproductions related to the Transportation exhibition. The contents of two of the four portfolios are enclosed and complete. One portfolio is enclosed and complete except for its contents list. The fourth portfolio is open, with missing content.
